product_name: Seattle Sports Dry Doc Kindle Case
long_description: The tough Seattle Sports Dry Doc Kindle case protects your Kindle(TM) wireless reading device and other small valuables with PVC-free, puncture-resistant film and a waterproof, resealable closure. Highly transparent film makes viewing contents easy. Positive-snap, resealable closure is easy to use and allows quick access.
short_description: The tough Seattle Sports Dry Doc Kindle case protects your Kindle(TM) wireless reading device and other small valuables with PVC-free, puncture-resistant film and a waterproof, resealable closure.
